de.mrapp.android.preference

Enum AbstractColorPickerPreference.ColorFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<AbstractColorPickerPreference.ColorFormat>
      • de.mrapp.android.preference.AbstractColorPickerPreference.ColorFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<AbstractColorPickerPreference.ColorFormat>
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractColorPickerPreference

    public static enum AbstractColorPickerPreference.ColorFormat
extends java.lang.Enum<AbstractColorPickerPreference.ColorFormat>
    The formats, which are supported to print textual representations of colors.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ARGB
      Formats the color by printing its alpha, red, green and blue components.
      HEX_3_BYTES
      Formats the color as a hexadecimal string, consisting of three bytes.
      HEX_4_BYTES
      Formats the color as a hexadecimal string, consisting of four bytes, including its alpha component.
      RGB
      Formats the color by printing its red, green and blue components.
